patthana14.1:2.1_0: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana14.1:2.1_2: hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:2.1_3: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:3.1_1: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:3.1_2: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:4.1_0: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:4.1_1: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:4.1_2: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.1:6.1_0: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:7.1_0: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:8.1_0: Nahetu dhammo nanahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana14.1:9.1_0: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
